testcase.name: S.2.18.(e) - Representation and @decimal for other numeric facts
testcase.description: Ratios and percentages (pure item type facts) MUST be reported with at least four decimals (four digits after decimal point) unless they are insignificant zeros (i.e. "0" digits after the decimal point) and @decimals >= 4. Other numeric facts (different than monetary, integer, ratios and percentages, e.g. decimal item type) MUST be reported with appropriate precision.

variation.description: XBRL instance with percentage facts having @decimals="4".
XBRL instance with percentage facts having @decimals less than "4".
